title: Design Matters from the Archive: James Victore
description: Debbie talks to James Victore about his apprenticeship in graphic design, about the role of opinion in his work, and about his suspicions of surface beauty and polish.
itunes:subtitle: Debbie talks to James Victore about his apprenticeship in graphic design, about the role of opinion in his work, and about his suspicions  of surface beauty and polish.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
